artist: Artist: Frederic Remington; Author: Nelson A. Miles; Publisher: Werner Company, Chicago
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Frank Meyers Steiner
description: Illustrated book with wood engravings and color photolithographs by Frederick Remington and one watercolor with pen and ink drawing by Remington on foreleaf; binding: maroon leather (rebound); housed in buckram and leather slipcase
medium: Wood engravings, color photolithographs, with watercolor and ink drawing; bound volume
provenance: Irene G. Steiner, Wayzata, Minn. ; given to MIA, 1999.
signed: In pen and ink, on foreleaf and dedication page: Frederick Remington
title: Personal Recollections and Observations of General Nelson A. Miles
